Class ContactSelector

public inherited sharing class ContactSelector

Description: Runs queries on the Contact object References:

Changes

08/10/2021 Initial version.
10/17/2023 getContactsByEmail(): Get contacts by email.
08/30/2024 getContactsByEmail(): Method overloaded to accept a list of emails or a single email address.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public static ContactSelector.Result
getContactsByEmail(List<String> emails)
Queries the Contact object for records with the specified email addresses.

Queries the Contact object for records with the specified email addresses.

Methods

public static ContactSelector.Result getContactsByEmail(List<String> emails)

Queries the Contact object for records with the specified email addresses.

Parameters:
    emails – List<String>: The email addresses to search for.

Returns:
    Result: Object containing the contact records.

Since:
    08/30/2024

public static ContactSelector.Result getContactsByEmail(Set<String> emails)

Queries the Contact object for records with the specified email addresses.

Parameters:
    emails – Set<String>: The email addresses to search for.

Returns:
    Result: Object containing the contact records.

Since:
    10/17/2023

public static ContactSelector.Result getContactsByEmail(String email)

Queries the Contact object for records with the specified email address.

Parameters:

Returns:
    Result: Object containing the contact records.

Since:

public static ContactSelector.Result getContactsById(Set<Id> contactIds)

Queries the Contact object for records with the specified IDs.

Parameters:
    contactIds – Set<Id>: The contact IDs to retrieve
